intro.heading: Stay Curious, Keep Growing
intro.paragraph: Whether you’re building your career or diving into a new passion, EPL provides access to top-tier learning resources, workshops, and certifications at no cost. So, stay curious and keep on sharpening your skills with a library card!

access.heading: Get Certifications Without the Extra Cost
access.paragraph: Your EPL card gives you unlimited opportunities to expand your knowledge and skill set. Last year, thousands of Edmontonians accessed learning tools through their library cards. With your card, you can:
list: Gain new career skills with LinkedIn Learning’s professional courses.
Get hands-on experience with studio labs, recording studios, and more .
Earn certifications in 3D printing, sewing, and digital design tools.
Join book clubs, workshops , and speaker events to connect with experts.
Access documentaries and educational films that inspire and inform.
access.paragraph2: Join thousands of digital explorers, get your EPL card today!

customerStories.heading: Customer Stories
customerStories.quote: I am really happy that the EPL plays such a big role in the community. People of all ages and walks of life are welcome at the Library. Thank you for the wonderful staff and all that they do! Thanks for the Makerspace, art, music and lectures.
customerStories.author: A. Arntzen

whyGetEPLCard.heading: Why Get an EPL Card?
whyGetEPLCard.paragraph: Unlock a world of knowledge with your EPL card. Access top learning resources, expert-led courses, and more anytime, anywhere!

card1.heading: ONLINE RESOURCE
card1.content: Gain in-demand skills with thousands of expert-led courses covering business, technology, and creative topics. Whether you're looking to advance your career or pick up a new hobby, your EPL card gives you access to top-tier training.

card2.heading: ONLINE RESOURCE
card2.content: Take your learning further with instructor-led online courses on everything from professional development and business to creative writing and personal wellness. Learn at your own pace with engaging, interactive lessons.

card3.heading: ONLINE RESOURCE
card3.content: Explore your creativity and try something new in EPL’s Makerspace. From 3D printing and vinyl cutting to sewing machines and studio labs, you’ll find the tools and support you need to bring your ideas to life.

card4.heading: ONLINE RESOURCE
card4.content: Enjoy the highest-quality photojournalism and cartography with unparalleled, in-depth coverage of cultures, nature, science, technology and the environment.

questions.title: What do I need to get a library card?
questions.text:
Getting your EPL card is simple. Visit any EPL location with identification (Drivers’ License, Alberta Health Care Card, etc.) and proof of Edmonton address in hand or signup online for a 45-day temporary card to start experiencing some of the benefits of EPL membership before visiting a branch to get a full membership.
If you're under 18, your parent or guardian must sign for you, and they'll be responsible for what you borrow.

questions.title: Do I need a special app or software to access EPL’s online learning resources?
questions.text: No special app or software is required. You can access EPL’s online learning resources directly from our website. Simply click on the resource you’d like to use, log in with your EPL card, and start learning.

questions.title: Do I need a library card to access online learning resources?
questions.text: Yes, you need an active EPL card to access all library resources. You must be an Edmonton resident to qualify. Sign up today!
